title: An Error report about pipeline
raw_output:
{'files_to_modify': ['src/transformers/pipelines/question_answering.py', 'src/transformers/pipelines/__init__.py', 'src/transformers/modelcard.py', 'src/transformers/pipelines.py', 'src/transformers/data/processors/squad.py'], 'reasoning': "1. 'src/transformers/pipelines/question_answering.py' manages the question-answering pipeline where KeyError 'token_type_ids' likely originates when the pipeline preprocesses/model expects this key.
2. 'src/transformers/pipelines/__init__.py' is the entry point for pipeline creation and could require update to better handle missing model card or manage defaults for input keys.
3. 'src/transformers/modelcard.py' handles downloading/loading the model card file; modifications here may resolve download errors or fallback behavior.
4. 'src/transformers/pipelines.py' ties together model card logic inside pipeline and manages error/fallback handling seen in the initial model card warning.
5. 'src/transformers/data/processors/squad.py' is responsible for preprocessing data and generating 'token_type_ids' (essential for question-answering); missing values or preprocessing bugs here might be the root of the KeyError."}
